short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-driven career companion that enhances your meetings – providing real-time insights and guidance for a success journey.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 **Career Copilot: Elevate Your Virtual Meetings with AI Assistance**

🗣️ Tired of juggling between meeting notes and discussions? Introducing Meeting Copilot, your AI-powered assistant for virtual meetings! This Chrome extension seamlessly integrates with your favorite meeting platforms, reading subtitles in real-time, and providing valuable insights from OpenAI.

✨ **Key Features:**

- 🎙️ **Real-time Subtitle Analysis:** Meeting Copilot captures and analyzes spoken content during your virtual meetings, ensuring you never miss a crucial detail.

- 🤖 **OpenAI Integration:** Send requests to OpenAI directly from your meetings for enhanced information and AI-driven insights.

- 🌐 **User-Friendly Interface:** A simple and intuitive interface makes it easy for you to interact with Meeting Copilot during your meetings.

👉 **How to Use:**

1. **Install the Extension:** Add Meeting Copilot to your Chrome browser with a single click.

2. **Insert AI Key:**
  Click on extension, choose the AI and save your key! (Follow the links to get your own key)
  - OpenAI . (https://platform.openai.com/api-keys)
  - Google Gemini. (https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey)

3. **Enable Closed Captions:** To experience the full power of Meeting Copilot, make sure to enable closed captions during your Google Meetings.

4. **Enable Real-time Analysis:** Once installed, Meeting Copilot will automatically begin analyzing meeting subtitles.

5. **Send Requests to OpenAI:** Seamlessly send requests to OpenAI for additional information or answers during your meetings.

🔍 **Ready to Boost Your Meeting Experience?**

Meeting Copilot is designed to enhance your virtual meetings, providing valuable insights and support. Say goodbye to multitasking and hello to a smarter, more efficient meeting experience.

🌐 **Open Source and Collaborative:**

Join the growing community of Meeting Copilot enthusiasts! Contribute to the project, provide feedback, and help shape the future of virtual meetings.

👥 **Who Can Benefit:**
- Remote Workers
- Teams Collaborating Virtually
- Professionals Seeking Productivity Boost

Enhance your virtual meetings with Meeting Copilot today! 🚀

#MeetingCopilot #VirtualMeetings #AIAssistance #Productivity #OpenAI #ChromeExtension #MeetingSupport

👉 **Update: 1.5**
- *Mouse Selection Input Context*
     - Now you are able to 'Select' with your mouse and the text will be auto tracked to the new input. 
     - You doesn't need to select the entire message on the conversation, just selecting part of the text will allow request!
- *Editable Containers*
     - To allow flexibility now you can edit all the containers, select and update text and contexts to fine tunnings.


👉 **Update: 1.6**
- Repositioning: Now you are able to position the dialog anywhere!
- **Google Gemini**
  - We added Google Gemini and now you can choose the AI you want to use!
  - Reminder: You can get you Gemini Key here: https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey
- Layout Improvments:
  - We cleared the extension, added few clickable parts and improved to a better user experince.


👉 **Update: 1.8**
- Literally anywhere!
- **You Copilot now is available in any website**
  - Of course, you can just 'blacklist' that website and never see it again!
    - It's reversible, but not too simple.
         (Access the website, click anywhere in the site, open the extension and if the link is there, just click to unblock and refresh the page)
         (If the url is not in the 'unblock' button, you'll have to 'click' in the page to recognize)

- We now start collapsed!
  - This is implemented to allow better user experience, just use if you need.

- **REMOVED CLEAR**
   - Actually, after pagination the Clear button got lost so we updated it.
     Now you can send the message to AI without any specific prompt just passing your text, selections or whatever do you want to use directly to the AI, and receive On-Screen response.

**Update: 1.9**
Fixes for small bugs and UX improve.

👥 **Support:**
Did you had any issue? Fell free to send me an email: elsilveirasistemas@gmail.com
I'll be glad to hear your thoughts!
